summary: In 1940, after watching and being traumatized by the movie El doctor Frankenstein (1931), a sensitive seven year-old girl living in a small Spanish village drifts into her own fantasy world.
cast: Fernando Fernán Gómez|Teresa Gimpera|Ana Torrent|Isabel Tellería|Ketty de la Cámara|Estanis González|José Villasante|Juan Margallo|Laly Soldevila|Miguel Picazo
title: El espíritu de la colmena
